trans-unit.source: Represents a lightweight audio playback <xref href="System.Windows.TriggerAction"></xref> used to play .wav files.
trans-unit.target: 表示輕量的音訊播放<xref href="System.Windows.TriggerAction"></xref>用來播放.wav 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: After Dispose is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction> object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 Dispose 之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction>物件不再有效。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction>

trans-unit.source: Dispose is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進處置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the audio source location.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的音訊的來源位置。

trans-unit.source: Both relative and absolute pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] can be used to identify audio files that are of the following types: - **Resource Files**: files with a build action of `Resource`.
trans-unit.target: 相對與絕對的組件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]可以用來識別屬於下列類型的音訊檔:-**資源檔**︰ 檔案的建置動作`Resource`。

trans-unit.source: - **Content Files**: files with a build action of `Content`.
trans-unit.target: -**內容檔**︰ 檔案的建置動作`Content`。

trans-unit.source: - **Site Of Origin Files**: files with a build action of `None`.
trans-unit.target: -**來源站台檔案**︰ 檔案的建置動作`None`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on pack [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關組件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]，請參閱[WPF 中的組件 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on resource, content, and site of origin files, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資源、 內容和來源網站檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Source is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 來源是在.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|Source| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |來源 | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The audio source location.
trans-unit.target: 音訊的來源位置。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Source*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Source*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.SoundPlayerAction.Source*>

trans-unit.source: SourceProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: SourceProperty.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
